# Question 1
## a) create a normal distribution `(mean = 940, sd = 190)` and standardize it
```{r}
mean <- 940
sd <- 190
rnorm <- rnorm(1000, mean = mean, sd = sd)
rnorm_std <- (rnorm - mean) / sd
```

```{r}
hist(rnorm)
hist(rnorm_std)
```
